ProjectTitle: Model-based prediction of post-treatment walking patterns in cerebral palsy to support clinical decision making
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/07/2022
2. Data: you don't have to mention dissemination documents in a DMP
4. Metadata, if you use KWS or redcap with its metadata you can also describe this here; for medial imaging many researchers use the DICOM metadata standard. 
5. Storage: Are you storing personal data on a laptop or onedrive? If so, is this approved by the ethical committee UZL and which security measures are you taking (multi factor authentication, encryption, etc), what is the protected/ secure environment you mention under security? 
7. Sharing: For data sharing you could consider using KU Leuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr instead of Zenodo or, a disciplinary repository if those are available in your field.
label: good with suggestions
